title: !gus
description: Yet another CS:GO reference, In community hosted servers, an option is frequently available to select guns, available once a player types in '!gun' in chat. Because of this, it's frequently mistyped '!gum', '!gub' etc. The spummers frequently poke light-hearted fun at this, by typing '!gus' in game chat, as a gentle nod to the often-mistyped command.
